eu.geclipse.core.internal.model.notify
Class GridNotificationService

java.lang.Object
  eu.geclipse.core.internal.model.notify.GridNotificationService

public class GridNotificationService
extends java.lang.Object

The NotificationService is the central point that manages all event notifications from the Grid model to the outside world.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static GridNotificationService getInstance()
Get the singleton service instance.

Returns:
The singleton instance.

addListener

public void addListener(IGridModelListener listener)
Add a IGridModelListener to the service. The listener will be informed about all events.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to be added.

lock

public void lock()
Locks the notification service. A locked service will collect all events without delivering them to the listeners unless it is unlocked again. For each lock an unlock has to be called. An internal counter in incremented when lock is called and decremented again when unlock() is called. So only if all locks are unlocked again the pending events will be delivered.

See Also:
unlock()

queueEvent

public void queueEvent(IGridModelEvent event)
Add an event to this service's event queue. If the service is not locked the event is delivered immediately, otherwise it is stored until the service is unlocked again.

Parameters:
event - The event to be queued.

removeListener

public void removeListener(IGridModelListener listener)
Remove the specified listener from the list of listeners. The listener will not retrieve any further notifications.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to be removed.

unlock

public void unlock()
Unlock the service.

See Also:
lock()
